Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

Improvisations on Two Norwegian Folk Songs, op. 29

1878

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1.
  • 2.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/3 · Arrangementer av norsk folkemusikk · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Könemann · K 175 · Norwegian Folk Songs and Dances · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100b · Piano Works / II / Original Works

1.

This improvisation is based on the song Guten aa Gjenta paa Fjøshellen.

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2.

This improvisation is based on the song Dœ va eigøng ein Kung ’e.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3
